Pre-Game Insights: India have played 2 matches in the series and will be looking to strengthen their hold of the top spot, while South Africa have also played 2 matches in the series and they are currently ranked second on the points table.

In the last match (Netherlands vs India) played by India against Netherlands, India beat Netherlands by 56 runs. The top fantasy player for India was Bhuvneshwar Kumar who scored 92 fantasy points.
In their last match in this series against Bangladesh, South Africa beat Bangladesh by 104 runs. The top fantasy player for South Africa was Rilee Rossouw who scored 158 fantasy points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Perth Stadium, Perth is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 150 runs. Batting first should be the preferred option at the venue, with the team batting first winning 65% of its matches.
Pacers have been very successful at this venue. They have taken 73% of the total wickets at this venue. We would suggest that you pick as many pace bowlers as possible in your team.
Others: Fantasy Gully experts predict that the pitch will continue to assist the pacers.
